website_summaries.verdict: Many find this formula reduces acne scars quickly, and brightens their skin tone over time.
pros: Exfoliates scar tissue using salicylic acid and glucosamine
Vitamin C and tiger grass improve skin's appearance
Made without parabens, phthalates and other questionable ingredients
cons: Contains silicone, which is a problem for some

customer_reviews.title: Barely any product in the bottle
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this product 3 times and it’s already barely giving me any product when I press the pump. I opened it up and it’s essentially just full of air with a fourth of the bottle being product. Don’t waste your money, this product is expensive & you get hardly anything in return.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: It was a very small bottle but I only had a small surface area of acne scars. It might have lasted 3 or 4 weeks. I quit using after 3 days. Right after first use I broke out all along my chin and jaw line. It seemed to get worse daily. Immediately after I quit using it my face calmed down. Maybe because I use proactive as well I'd. But didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Stutes

customer_reviews.title: Heals Skin!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a few weeks and my skin is significantly smoother. I scar easily and it’s been such a blessing to have found this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trial size!!
customer_reviews.text: Very small bottle with very little product... I like how it makes my skin feel but for $35 for such a small bottle (trial size) I feel I was duped.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie29

customer_reviews.title: Wldnt recommend
customer_reviews.text: Used for month with no results. And barely any product in bottle. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: chanell

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I have very mild old acne scars and it honestly didn’t do anything even tho I applied it every morning and evening regularly.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Got for daughter's acne scars
customer_reviews.text: She has been using it for a week now, so I think we need to wait longer to see results.
customer_reviews.author: Martha L. Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid to purchase this because it had bad reviews of the quantity that you get. I have no clue what those people are talking about. I have a problem area with acne and it works fantastic for that. I bought it a whole ago and still have plenty. Maybe not best value if you're doing your whole face but for just areas it works fantastic. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! Why did I wait so long to use a Murad product? I went from 20 years of having discoloration and acne marks that were so visible, especially on my left cheek, to them almost being vanished!! Love love love. Get it now because I’m buying this for the rest of my life! Just to add... I’ve been using this product for about 6 weeks. I began seeing REAL results after 4 weeks so it takes a bit of time but SO worth it. And btw - I’m still on my first bottle! This is an honest review, not sponsored at all. Just wanted to share how great this is!
customer_reviews.author: Janis0612

customer_reviews.title: Very small amount in bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Although it does leave me feeling moisturized, it states results will be seen in 8 weeks although there’s maybe two weeks of product in the bottle. On the second day I was pumping just air. It’s only been a week and I’m having to shake it to get some out. I’m not even using it on my full face. Not worth the price. I’m sure there’s a better product.
customer_reviews.author: ryker

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I use this at night and the “The Ordinary niacinamide and zinc”during the day. I have seen amazing results in the lightning of cystic and hormonal acne scars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Reichl

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I thought i was going to need $100s of dollars in procedures but after a week of using this product. im already noticing great results and am much more confident with my skin. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. I got face scars since I was teenager and my skin has improved since I have been using this product. The face scars have been improving and it is getting better in time. I have been using it since January and I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This product works like no other ever has. It provides a smooth matte finish, filling in & covering up scars & blemishes. It also has a cumulative effect over time, actually improving the condition of the skin dramatically. You do have to continually use to keep the effect. For even better results, follow up with Murad matte 45 sunscreen. If does come in a small container & is a bit pricey, but you only have to use a small amount am & pm. It is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: DJC

customer_reviews.title: The first product that really helps with eliminating acne scars!
customer_reviews.text: I use it daily and experience a noticeable improvement of the appearance of my acne scars and skin tone. I've been trying a lot of products before and that's the first one that really works. It also helps with speeding up the recovery of new outbreaks.
customer_reviews.author: Sigal Bernanka

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little taken back by how small the bottle is for $35 when I first got it. However, I have been using it for about a week now I think and I can see improvement already. My acne marks are fading and my skin's texture is smoothing out. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S. Young

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for 3 months now and it has done basically nothing for my scarring.
customer_reviews.author: Cortana

customer_reviews.title: 0 value for money
customer_reviews.text: I received it today. It came without a seal, which is not acceptable for a medicated gel like this. The bottle is already very small yet it is not full! I am sure it is not brand new, someone has opened and used it before shipping it to me and taking my 39 dollars. Horrible experience with Amazon! And the part that brings the gel out, I don't know how it is called, DOES NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.author: Munisa

customer_reviews.title: Ebanel facial serum
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product works well it's just so little need to make a larger size especially when you use twice a day as indicated by directions!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Turner

customer_reviews.title: Dissapoitning
customer_reviews.text: Was excited about this product but quite disappointed. Did not do much to eliminate scars at all. I have had better luck with other products. Feels great and makes skin soft...but that is about all it did.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa C

customer_reviews.title: Product takes time but really works
customer_reviews.text: Had 2 scars on my face above eye brows. After 1 month of use 2 times a day, I am noticing they are not as visible. I couldn’t believe it myself
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: I think it's working?
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about 6 weeks now. It's hard to tell if it has made a difference, honestly.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a few days. Naturally I haven't noticed any results yet, but I will continue using. I have heard good things about this product so hopefully it works as well as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: ashley flower

customer_reviews.title: Different consistency
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this originally from Ulta and I got great results! Very velvety and helped my complexion a lot. But, I ordered from Amazon for my second bottle and it seems to have a different consistency than the first. But so far I haven’t noticed any changes in my complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Callee S.

customer_reviews.title: Not having any reactions to it and I have very sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using it for a couple of weeks and my face is already clearing up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff. No smell. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it actually works. Should be a bigger size for someone who has a lot of scarring
customer_reviews.author: Keith B.

customer_reviews.title: Sorry it doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this product and didn’t have unrealistic expectations. I’ve been using this product regularly for well over two months and I haven’t noticed any difference. It doesn’t even help with breakouts, which is lame. Extremely dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Seeley

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! The texture is light enough that you can layer it as a primer under everything else but thick enough that you can feel it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: I love the sheerness.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for dark spots. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used it for one year, zero results
customer_reviews.text: I used this product faithfully for one year, and it had absolutely no results.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Robertson

product_meta.title: Murad InvisiScar Resurfacing Treatment for Lightening Scars and Dark Spots, 0.5 Fl Oz

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
